patterns.message: ❌ Firebase Auth must be used server-side only. Authentication is handled via API routes. Only Realtime Database (for bidding) is allowed on client.
❌ Firestore must be used server-side only (via firebase-admin). ALL database operations go through API routes. Use feature services (e.g., productsService) instead.
❌ Firebase Storage must be used server-side only. ALL file uploads go through API routes. Use mediaService.upload() instead.
❌ Firebase Auth SDK must be used server-side only. Use authService (which calls API routes) instead.
